Module se1.bestellsystem
Package application

Class Application_C3

java.lang.Object
application.Application_C3
public class Application_C3
extends java.lang.Object
Runnable application class that creates and outputs Customer's for the "se1.bestellsystem".
Version:
"1.0.0-SNAPSHOT_D1"
Author:
"Khatia Zitanishvili"

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Public main() function.
      Parameters:
      args - arguments passed from command line.

    • printCustomers

      public java.lang.StringBuffer printCustomers​(java.lang.StringBuffer sb, java.util.Collection<Customer> customers)
      Print Customer list into StringBuffer as lines with Customer attributes. 
       Example:
 | 643270 | Bayer, Anne              | anne24@yahoo.de, (030) 3481-23352   |
 | 412396 | Blumenfeld, Nadine-Ulla  | +49 152-92454                       |
 | 892474 | Meyer, Eric              | eric98@yahoo.com, (030) 3945-642298 |
      Parameters:
      sb - StringBuffer that will contains the formatted result. A new StringBuffer is created when sb is null.
      customers - collection of Customers (null argument is ignored).
      Returns:
      StringBuffer that contains formatted result (same sb).

    • printCustomers

      public java.lang.StringBuffer printCustomers​(java.lang.StringBuffer sb, java.util.Collection<Customer> customers, java.util.function.Function<java.util.stream.Stream<Customer>,​java.util.stream.Stream<Customer>> customerStream)
      Print Customer list into StringBuffer as lines with Customer attributes. Method provides control over the Stream of customer objects before formatting. 
       Example:
 | 643270 | Bayer, Anne              | anne24@yahoo.de, (030) 3481-23352   |
 | 412396 | Blumenfeld, Nadine-Ulla  | +49 152-92454                       |
 | 892474 | Meyer, Eric              | eric98@yahoo.com, (030) 3945-642298 |
      Parameters:
      sb - StringBuffer that will contains the formatted result. A new StringBuffer is created when sb is null.
      customers - collection of Customers (null argument is ignored).
      customerStream - functional interface to control (e.g. filter, sort) Stream<Customer> before formatting.
      Returns:
      StringBuffer that contains formatted result (same sb).

    • printCustomer

      public java.lang.StringBuffer printCustomer​(java.lang.StringBuffer sb, Customer c)
      Print Customer attributes into StringBuffer as column-separated line. 
       Example:
 | 892474 | Meyer, Eric                    | eric98@yahoo.com, (030) 3945-642298          |
      Parameters:
      sb - StringBuffer that will contains the formatted result. A new StringBuffer is created when sb is null.
      c - Customer object.
      Returns:
      StringBuffer that contains formatted result (same sb).

    • fmtCustomerName

      public java.lang.String fmtCustomerName​(Customer c, int... style)
      Format Customer name according to a style (0 is default): 
       style: 0: "Meyer, Eric"  10: "MEYER, ERIC"
        1: "Eric Meyer"   11: "ERIC MEYER"
        2: "Meyer, E."    12: "MEYER, E."
        3: "E. Meyer"     13: "E. MEYER"
        4: "Meyer"        14: "MEYER"
        5: "Eric"         15: "ERIC"
        6: "E.M."
        7: "EM"
        8: "E"
        9: "M"
      Parameters:
      c - Customer object.
      style - specify name formatting style as variable argument.
      Returns:
      formatted Customer name.
